body.name: BITEPASS Doorbell Camera Wireless, Smart Video Cam with Chime Ringer, AI Human Detection, Two Way Audio, HD Live View, Night Vision, 2.4G WiFi Only, Cloud Storage, Indoor Outdoor Surveillance

features: AI-Driven Human Recognition: Our smart technology, powered by Artificial Intelligence, accurately identifies human movement, thereby ignoring irrelevant motion such as passing cars or swaying trees.
High-Definition Wide-Angle View: Our wide-angle lens delivers live video footage with impressive clarity and detail.
Real-Time 2-Way Communication: Engage in live, two-way conversations with visitors from any location.
Robust IP65 Weatherproof Design: Boasting an IP65 rating for dust and water resistance, this doorbell continues to operate effectively in various weather scenarios, ensuring year-round protection.

Protected Cloud Storage: With our secure AES-128 encrypted cloud storage, you can opt for a subscription (sold separately) for improved user experience. Plus, a 30-day free trial for continuous recording and sharing is on us!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bitepass Smart Wireless Video Doorbell Camera with Chime Included

Secure Cloud Storage Our AES-128 encrypted cloud storage offers an enhanced experience through an optional subscription (available separately). Smart Human Detection Thanks to AI-driven technology, our system detects human activity, disregarding inconsequential motions like moving cars or fluttering foliage. Two-Way Audio Engage in real-time dialogues with visitors, no matter where you are. Superior Night Vision With infrared lights paired with a smart sensor, our camera promises exceptional video quality, even in dim lighting, ensuring round-the-clock safety.

Group Sharing Share camera access with family members for simultaneous remote monitoring. Complimentary Doorbell Chime The package includes a chime that you can place in any area of your home - be it the dining room, kitchen, or patio - for immediate notifications. Optimized 2.4GHz Wi-Fi Our camera is designed for 2.4GHz Wi-Fi connectivity (5GHz Wi-Fi not supported). Easily mount it anywhere using the included screws and wall anchors. All-Weather IP65 Design Featuring a robust IP65 rating, this doorbell is resilient to dust and moisture, performing consistently across diverse climatic conditions.

Can the doorbell camera handle connections to 5GHz Wi-Fi networks? This doorbell camera connects to 2.4GHz Wi-Fi only. Ensure you have two Wi-Fi networks, one for 2.4GHz and another for 5GHz, with different names for proper connection. Should I buy an SD card for this video doorbell? SD cards aren't needed for this doorbell camera. It saves to the cloud, and you can start with a free trial. Does the package contain an indoor chime? Yes, it offers a chime designed for indoors. Does the doorbell camera support viewing from a mobile phone remotely? Of course, the video is accessible for viewing via the Aiwit app. Is there any security measure like encryption for videos on the cloud? Certainly, your footage is under AES-128 encryption in our cloud storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bitepass doorbell extremely great video
reviews.reviewText: This product is really good it has multiple features is very clear to listen to when spoke through it has a very loud doorbell ring it's very easy to set up and install there's no issues with the camera there's no issues with the internet it works great you can come watch it from anywhere and it's very reasonably priced it's very good product I would recommend it to friends

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality product.
reviews.reviewText: I love this doorbell camera, it shows very clear pictures, the battery has amazing up time, the camera is light weight, simple installation. I highly recommend this product, nice and affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Note there is No SD card and you should pay for the clouds video if you like to see playback
reviews.reviewText: The Installation is relatively easy and the device connects to the network through the app there is no way to save the clips on the device and there is no sd card port. Only by using the cloud system (not free) The batteries last, the second device as speaker connects to the usb port and overall the device is quite good . The camera is ok .the company are super nice and was contacted me in a good vibe to solve all problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great quality doorbell camera that is affordable.
reviews.reviewText: This door bell camera.It is very easy to setup and gives great footage. The doorbell is loud so you can hear it from anywhere in your house.The microphone on the camera is clear on both sides to listen and speak.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this camera for my front door. I really like the camera and it's super easy to assemble. It was easy to download the app and connect. I have to recharge it about once a week depending on the weather. When the weather was below freezing for a couple weeks I had to recharge it almost daily, which was annoying, but I understood. What bothers me about the camera is after I charge it, I have to go into my app settings and make sure that the settings I want are checked. For some reason every time I charge it, it no longer will automatically do the wandering alarm or wandering detection. So I do have to go into the app settings and turn on those items again. Which is annoying, but I now know that's just something I have to do every time. Overall, I'm very happy with the camera. It has a clear picture and does great at notifying me when someone is on my front porch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pic quality and nice price!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for a Christmas white elephant gift. Didn't expect much since it was so cheaper. Works great though! Easy to install also!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Worked great when I first got it, but it only lasted 3 months before it completely stopped working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Janeia Tillman review
reviews.reviewText: This product is top tier and great quality! Easy set up from your phone and simple directions given! Love my doorbell camera! Not expensive at all!
